abstract: Christie’s auction season kick-off gives buyers a chance to bid on a conservative mix of works by tried-and-true artists, as many auction houses are experiencing drought in big-ticket artworks.
snippet: When the fall auction season kicks off at Christie’s on Tuesday evening, buyers will get a chance to bid on a conservative mix of works by tried-and-true artists.
lead_paragraph: When the fall auction season kicks off at Christie’s on Tuesday evening, buyers will get a chance to bid on a conservative mix of works by tried-and-true artists.

headline.main: A Bouquet of Offerings to Test Uncertain Waters
headline.print_headline: A Bouquet of Offerings To Test Uncertain Waters
